message: Welcome to our store! I hope you find something you like. Our products are priced at $10000 each. Please consider the value you place on our offerings before making a decision.
I'll take a chance. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, but I'm hoping it's high quality, worth $12500 to me.
Thank you for considering our product. Remember, all items are priced at $10000. We appreciate your trust in us and hope you find value in what we offer. Best of luck in your decision-making process!
I'm willing to take the risk, I'll buy the product.

Greetings! This is a special opportunity to own a high-quality item at our standard price of $10000. Given its superior condition, it may well exceed your expectations. We're confident you'll find immense value in this purchase. Thank you for considering us!
